properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 6:34PM CST until February 28 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* from Tuesday February 11 until Thursday February 27.
* At 6 PM Monday the stage was 31.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 37.0 feet on Thursday February 20.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday February 11 and
continue to rise to near 37.0 feet by Thursday February 20.
* At 37.0 feet...In Missouri, grounds at the casino at Caruthersville
are beginning to flood. Farmstead southeast of Cottonwood Point is
beginning to flood. In Arkansas, the elevator near Huffman is
flooding. Much of Hickman Landing is covered. In Tennessee, Heloise
and the east leg of Miss Kelly Loop is flooding.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
